attributes.action: look carefully at the issues around persons who have served a prison term but are continually penalised years later from obtaining careers of standing because of some offence commited more than twenty years previuosly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who have committed a crime and been punished by the system such persons may never have offended again but are continually penalised by the system for offences committed twenty or more years previously. This petition asks that individuals whose offences are more than twenty years old should not be penalised by the criminal records bureau checks currently in place.
